meanings.definition: The outskirts or boundaries of a place.
meanings.sent1: We decided to explore the purlieux of the forest to find hidden treasures.
meanings.sent2: The children played happily in the purlieux of the park, away from the crowded center.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel was caught stealing nuts from the purlieux of the garden.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, shadows crept into the purlieux of the town, casting a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The old map led us through the purlieux of the ancient ruins, where time seemed to stand still.
